variant.p: The boards decided to clarify that the measurement requirements apply when measuring the fair value of an asset or a liability that is not measured at fair value in the statement of financial position but for which the fair value is disclosed (eg for financial instruments subsequently measured at amortised cost in accordance with IFRS 9 Financial Instruments or IAS 39 Financial Instruments: Recognition and Measurement and for investment property subsequently measured using the cost model in accordance with IAS 40 Investment Property).
